synopsis.p: Plot the cross polar cap potential, scatter statistics or IMF conditions from a convection map file.

description.p: Plot the cross polar cap potential, scatter statistics or IMF conditions from a convection map file.
The output can be to an X terminal, Portable PixMap (PPM) files, extended Portable PixMap (PPMX), rPlot XML document,or PostScript file. The default output is rPlot XML.
If the "-x" option is specified the program will display plots in an X terminal window in all other cases the output is written to standard out.

example.description: Plot the cross polar cap potential from the file "20040830.map" on the X terminal.
Generate an rPlot XML plot of the cross polar cap potential and scatter statistics from the file "20021219.map". The plot is stored in the file "pc.rp.xml".
